subject_information.address: 49331 Lewis Views Apt. 516, Lake Maryshire, DE 59549

suspicious_activity.narrative: Between July 18 and July 31, 2025, Jacqueline Rodriguez (ID: CUST_0111) received a large incoming wire transfer of $76,517.25. This was followed by multiple outgoing transfers below $10,000, totaling $49,517.51. The activity appears structured to evade BSA reporting requirements.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: The customer has a high-risk rating. The transactions show a sudden large incoming wire transfer of $76,517.25, followed by multiple outgoing transfers just below $10,000, indicating possible structuring to avoid reporting requirements.
